meanings.definition: The act of repairing or making something right.
meanings.sent1: I am good at fixing things around the house.
meanings.sent2: The fixing of the broken chair was done quickly.
meanings.sent3: Fixing the leaky faucet turned into a family project.
meanings.sent4: Her fixing of the situation was like a superhero saving the day.
meanings.sent5: The fixing of the old car brought it back to life.

meanings.definition: A solution or remedy for a problem.
meanings.sent1: His fixing for the issue was innovative.
meanings.sent2: The fixing to the dilemma was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The fixing to the puzzle was right in front of them.
meanings.sent4: Her fixing for the problem was like a lightbulb moment.
meanings.sent5: The fixing provided a much-needed answer.

meanings.definition: The act of fastening or securing something in place.
meanings.sent1: The fixing of the sign to the wall was sturdy.
meanings.sent2: She used a fixing to keep the painting straight.
meanings.sent3: The fixing of the tent was a team effort.
meanings.sent4: His fixing of the loose screw was precise.
meanings.sent5: The fixing of the lock made the door secure.
